comment: She's super nice, caring, but lectures are boring, kinda all over the place sometimes. Three papers, they were kind of difficult but she will help you if you need. She grades very fairly.The quizzes were online, open book but honestly was the hardest part about the class for me. Few discussions too but other than that it wasn't too bad.
she just talked alot. like...alot. but her class was fairly easy the study guide was easy to understand before the tests and the questions were all multiple choice.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Lecture heavy

comment: I will say she does lecture the entire semester but the workload is sooo easy. Theres only like 3 quizzes and one movie analysis paper as the big assignment. As long as u can listen and pay attention to the lectures youll pass. shes super sweet and u can tell she loves teaching what she does.
I hate her!! lol!! if you can avoid her avoid her please do. she literally rejects all points of views that are not hers. she ruined my 4.0.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Markle is the hardest grader I have ever seen. If you aren't reading the readings front to back and listening to her opinions on certain topics you won't get a passing grade. I took this class for an elective and regret it.

Dr. Markle really makes you work for your grade. She's a tough grader, but is a very nice person who is understanding and there to help you. Her quizzes/tests are difficult and we had 4 papers throughout the semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Make sure to follow her assignment criteria and you'll surely get a good grade. Her quizzes, assignments, and papers all require you to read the assigned readings so be prepared to take time to understand and them. Overall, she is very passionate about her profession and I would recommend taking her class if you are a Sociology major.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Proceed with caution. Prof Markle is one of the most irritating professors I've ever had. She takes off points for the dumbest crap (like using a synonym of the word she wants you to use). Shes loves "throwing shade" to the class. She's not the worst, but she's down the line. You also have A LOT of readings. She'll also shut you down if you debate.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: PLAN TO PARTICIPATE. I TOOK THIS COURSE ONLINE, IT WASNT TOO HEAVY. YOU WRITE A 1 PAGE PAPER FOR EACH DISCUSSION AND REPLY TO A FEW OTHER CLASSMATES FOR EACH SECTION. YOU WILL HAVE A LONNNGGGG PAPER DUE AT THE END, BUT IF YOU PREPARE YOU SHOULD BE FINE. ITS A GREAT CLASS AND I PICKED UP A FEW GREAT POINTERS IN THE CLASS. EXCELLENT TEACHER!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Heavy on lectures and the powerpoints are very bare bones so that sucks. But you learn a lot and the information was largely new to me and very informative. Just wish there was more variety in the classes and more detailed powerpoints. There are a lot of readings too. She is generally happy but at the same time she can get snarky real quick.

TAKE DR. MARKLE! She is one of my favorite professors at KSU, I absolutely loved her class. She does make you work for your grade, but if you show up and DO THE READINGS you are going to get an A. Seriously though, read the readings that are assigned, you need to know them for the exam and for the case study analyses. She is so kind and inspiring.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Would take again

comment: Loved this class! There were 3 tests and 3 case studies. The tests were multiple choice and 4 short answer. Do the readings or you will not pass the tests. There is a ton of reading but it's interesting. Lectures can be kind of boring. She gives great feedback on case studies. Easy A if you do the readings and show up to class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She is the best hands down!! She gives points if you show up to majority of the classes. There were three tests and three case study papers. The papers and tests were simple. The tests are multiple choice/essay. The information literally all comes from her study guide and lectures. She gives great feedback on papers. Would take her again. LOVE HER!

Honestly not sure what she even gets paid to do. She isn't knowledgeable about the subject she reads statistics from notes. Very quick to catch an attitude when she is called on things that are not right. Not nearly enough assignments for how harshly she grades them. I took this for an elective I regret every second of it. She is horrible

This is one of the WORST professors I have taken. She hardly knows the material, PPs are useless, she doesn't explain what she wants until after you turn it in. And is extremely disrespectful I personally didn't have any run ins with her but she was rude to classmates; even got in ones face while she asked for clarification. Do not take her!

I think some people who reviewed her either didn't study well or didnt engage themselves enough. Dr Markle is great, I have taken her classes twice. Yes there are some heavy lectures that might make you sleepy but the info is interesting & she is knowledgeable about what she teaches. She gives good feedback. Contact her if you need help.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Boring lectures- she just reads from notes or PP. extremely particular about assignments without  clear instruction. she is easily offended by different points of view. nit picky. does not grade objectively, takes off different amounts of points from different students for same problems. pretty bad overall

sweet lady but very excentric. assigns a lot of readings. reads straight from powerpoints and the class is boring. Very vague with what she wants,grades harshly and doesn't explain what she really wants until after you turn something in which sucks because a lot of the assignments are 20% of  your grade. Offers extra credit if you miss no classes
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Professor Markle is great, but she assigns a LOT of reading and the test questions on the reading are more technical. She will ask you for exact statistics, etc. Her lectures are also very boring, focusing mostly on statistics. She gets flustered when people have different opinions than her. Despite all of that, she's still a good and fair prof.

Dr. Markle is super helpful if you show initiative and will go to great lengths to help you do well. You have to engage with her though because her lectures can sometimes be a bit vague and her language often downplays the intensity that she grades. Overall she is fantastic and I will definitely take her again.
Dr. Markle is possibly the best professor on campus, she is also my advisor. She cares very much about the students grade and is very hands on, she also makes herself available. Take her!

I found her class to be very interesting and enjoyed going everyday. It was a topic that I enjoyed and I feel that she was a great professor and very understanding. I found the tests to be quite easy, and the papers to were not challenging to write. Just read the material and an A is easy to obtain. I would take her again if I could.

Dr. Markle does not seem like she enjoys teaching. She gets very angry if a students has an opinion that differs from her own. Lectures are terribly boring because it looks like she is reading off of a piece of paper. If you take her, read every article she assigns on the syllabus.
Lectures are boring but overall an easy class. She gives extra credit if you're there every day. Would recommend her.
Professor is very helpful. Lectures are boring, but she keeps you engaged.

I dreaded taking Senior Seminar. Markle makes it manageable. I got an A. She is a very nice professor. Attendance is Mandatory. You have to go through a mock interview, summarize four chapters from a novel, write the 12-15 page paper, and present the paper. For a month, we had no class. This was for us to work on the paper. Awesome experience. :)
Very sweet teacher. Lectures are  VERY repetitive and it WILL get boring. Do your work, pay attention, and you will pass.

Markle is extremely nice. She doesn't lecture from the book, which can get really boring really quick. Read your book and study for your tests. You only have a few grades, so it's really important to do well on everything. I'd definitely recommend her.

Wonderful woman, but easy to anger. Have seen some students get into spats with her and walk  out of the room... Also, very helpful. She really will go to the ends of the earth to help you with her prompts--which she grades HARD. Pay attention, ask questions, and take notes...and don't talk politics with her--and you'll pass easily!

She's actually very sweet. I would recommend her. Her tests were kind of tricky even with a cheat sheet. I didn't buy the book. Power points are online but take notes. I think her class could have been easier to me if i really paid attention. Overall, she's someone you should take. She's EXTREMELY nice did i mention?

She is very helpful and this class was not easy. She's willing to help you after class and durig office hours. She also answers emails. If u come to class and do the assignments you should do fine. She gives detailed directions on what she wants on the papers. Allows you to use a page of notes for midterm and final.

Professor Markle was great! I went in the class dreading it because it was a subject I was uninterested in and it was at 8am, but she made the class fun! There were three exams and 2 papers basically graded for completion, instead of grammatical errors. You have to study for the tests, but it is definitely possible to make an A!

Race and Ethnicity is potentially a controversial subject, but Dr. Markle kept it positive and interesting. Her powerpoints and study guides are very helpful in preparing for tests. An essay is required, but she grades tests and papers very fairly. Great professor! As for the book,it is a must if you want an A.

Wonderful teacher! Anyone who tries at all can be successful in her class. She encourages you to meet with her to make sure you are on track on your research, and bends over backwards to steer you the right direction. I dreaded Senior Sem coming into this, and left absolutely loving the class!

Must come to class, can't miss more than four of them. Take notes because she elaborates on the bullet points on the powerpoints. Do the study guides and review them and you will do well. Two analysis papers as well that are requires. Overall not that hard.
Take this Prof. Plus she is hot

she is one of the coolest teachers, i took her spring 2010 for soci 2201, three news article essays, three tests, attendence are extra credit, tests arent hard, gives study guides, class lectures arent boring, i looked forward to her class all the time. i made an A+... take her and you wont regret

Ms. Markle turned a potentially tough class into an enjoyable class. She offers you all the help that you are willing to take the time to seek. It wasn't effortless, but not a hard A either. I strongly recommend her for this class.

Dr. Markle is a great person, her class is an easy a, its not boring, news artlicles are easy 100s theres gonnna be three, her tests are easy if you review, she gives study guides, and finds time to help, she posts note on vista, and has three tests, also she gives extra credit for attendance and as well as at the end of the semester, easy A guys,

Loved her! Attendance is required though. You can miss two classes without being penalized. Gives you study guides before each tests - straight off her powerpoints - so go to class. Book use was minimal.I would still recommend buying it. Overall great experience and interesting class! Thinking about changing my major to sociology or criminal justic

Great teacher, the ONLY reason someone would complain about her was if they expect an easy A. Tests are hard, but nothing studying can't solve. Always willing to help and will even study with you if you put in the time. I definitely plan on taking her again. Phenomenal woman!

A+ is very attainable if you show up, take notes and study for the 3 tests. She provides comprehensive study guides and even reviews them in class if you request. Her 3 papers were easy 100s! The book was needed to prepare for tests. Material is very interesting and Dr. Markle makes it fun to learn.

I liked her class.Lectures were kinda boring.However, she taught straight from powerpts which are posted online before class.She posted study guides as well for all 3 tests(no final).There are 3 short analysis papers but easy 100s if u follow her requirements. Attendance mandatory but she gives extra credit added to final grade for good attendance.

Dr. Markle is a very good professor. The class was very easy and she was helpful. Only three tests and three analysis papers. She gives a study guide for each test and the tests come straight from the notes. She gives extra credit for perfect attendance as well. If you come to class, and take notes, it's an easy A.

This was a horrible class! Material was very interesting but she is not. Half the class withdrew and her class lectures are far from informative. Her tests are ridiculous and her grading of papers is extremely biased and hasty. I would choose a different teacher because the class could have been a lot of fun.
Markle is such an easy teacher! She is sooo sweet and will even look through your paper before you turn it in. I got 100's on all of the journals! I definitely recommend her!!!!

I was always a slightly interested in sociology.  But after taking her class, I think I want to make it my major of study!  Really good and balanced teacher.  She encourages class discussions, which means a lot in a class like this.

Would definitely have chosen a different teacher for this class if I could. Very boring lectures with little clarity about what is to be expected on tests. Class is mandatory, probably because no one wants to attend.

I had Professor Mackle, Spring 2010 and she was great teacher. Loved the her class, U have to go 2 class, read the text book & write 3 articles. Give study guide for all her test and post power points & watched films.

The quality of Mrs. Markle's classroom compared to the material tested upon is very low.  Attendance is required but I do not know why because what is covered in class is non-existent on the test.  The Study Guides that are given might as well be about what not to study for the test.  Discussion participation is looked down on if not factual.
